title: Frieze, 1905–15
inscribed: Possible inscription in selvedge: ribbon with illegible letters (Standard Papers?)
description:
Row of staggered yellow poppies stemming from scroll-like architectural structures filled with thin leafy vines. Bottom has stripes of yellow and green. Grounding is shaded from light pink (top and bottom) to light yellow (middle). The monochrome blue background design alternates between floral bands and groups of thin lines. Top has stripes of green and foliate bands (same as in architectural structure).
Possible inscription in selvedge: ribbon with illegible letters (Standard Papers?)

tombstone.epitaph:
Frieze, 1905–15.
1905–15. Machine-printed on paper. Gift of Victorian Collectibles. 1979-91-509.
